h1: How to take a photo of your fit note

list.li1: You can use a smartphone, tablet or camera. Or you can use a scanner connected to a computer.
list.li2: Make sure your fit note is landscape (horizontal) not portrait (vertical).
list.li3: The whole fit note must be shown. It needs to be on 1 A4 page.
list.li4: Check that the image is in focus and all the text can be read.

fit-note-zoom-alt-text: An incorrect photograph of a zoomed in fit note and a correct clear photograph of a fit note
